title: Democracy is fair elections and wide suffrage

content.question: Which of the following identifies two basic elements of all modern representative democracies?

choices.label: Free and fair elections and widespread suffrage
A written constitution and separation of powers
Free speech and private ownership of all industry
Proportional representation and a judiciary with the power of constitutional review
Representative government and separation of executive and legislative powers

content.answer: Free and fair elections and widespread suffrage

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
